sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the diagnostic value of transcranial color duplex sonography for vertebrobasilar arterial insufficiency (VBI).
sentences.chinese: 目的研究經顱超聲對椎基底動脈供血不足的診斷價值。

sentences.english: With every cardiac compression, they were perfusing the brain, keeping it alive.
sentences.chinese: 心臟每次壓縮，都會向腦部供血，維持其功能。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the therapeutic efficacy of Xuanyunning in patients with verte-brobasilar insufficiency.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察眩暈寧治療椎基底動脈供血不足的療效。

sentences.english: A reduced blood supply to the muscles accelerates feelings of fatigue.
sentences.chinese: 並降低了肌肉供血，加速疲勞感。

sentences.english: The flap was one which was supplied blood by transverse facial artery.
sentences.chinese: 頰部皮瓣系主要由面橫動脈供血的皮瓣。

sentences.english: Pituitary adenoma and craniopharyngioma mainly receive blood supply from the anterior cycle of Willis.
sentences.chinese: 垂體腺瘤和顱咽管瘤主要接受前循環供血。

sentences.english: Smoking hampers the blood supply that keeps skin tissue looking supple and healthy.
sentences.chinese: 吸菸防癌供血而使皮膚組織保持柔軟健康。

sentences.english: Your baby’s heart begins to beat and pump blood this week.
sentences.chinese: 這一週嬰兒的心臟將會開始跳動和供血。

sentences.english: CPR can help maintain blood flow to the organs until an electrical shock (defibrillation) can be given.
sentences.chinese: 在除顫實施之前，它可以幫助維持重要器官的供血。

sentences.english: An insufficient blood supply accelerates fatigue and increases the risk of injury.
sentences.chinese: 不足的供血加速了疲勞，提高了受傷的風險。

sentences.english: Notice that there is a variation in the brain perfusion since the left frontal lobe is supplied by the right internal carotid artery.
sentences.chinese: 但是灌注後發現左額葉卻是由右側頸內動脈分支供血。

sentences.english: It is safer to use the first dorsal metatarsal artery system as the second blood supply system.
sentences.chinese: 以第一跖骨底動脈系統作爲第二套供血系統更安全。

definition: silted up/obstructed by silt/variant of 瘀滯|瘀滞[yu1 zhi4]
